item.title: 10 Best Computer Monitors (2025): Budget, OLED, 4K
item.description: The Gear team spends countless hours in front of displays while writing for you. So we reviewed those too (including a few portable screens).

item.title: Samsung Smart Monitor M9 M90SF Review: The 4K OLED Hybrid
item.description: Finally, a 4K OLED smart monitor that’s just as good a TV as it is a PC monitor.

item.title: TCL QM8K Review: The Best Mid-Tier TV
item.description: It doesn’t matter what you’re watching or where, this new mini LED TCL pushes the boundaries of budget beauty.
